TEXT.English: Please support [OUR_CIV_SHORT] and it's people. We depend on your help!
This will be of mutual benefit for us both, don't you think so?
Our armies are evenly matched, but I believe in a battle I would win out. So that this does not occur I ask you to meet our demands.
TEXT.French: Partager, c'est le d?but de l'amiti?, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.German: Helfen hei?t br?derlich teilen, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Italian: Se ci tieni a me, condividi, [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: [OUR_CIV_SHORT] needs this and demands your assistance!
Brazil is strong in many ways, [CT_NAME]. Do not force me to show you how strong.
You are outgunned and outclassed. I suggest you give me what I demand.
TEXT.French: R?pondez ? nos exigences ou vous subirez la foudre de notre "terrible et rapide ?p?e".
TEXT.German: Schlagt ein, wenn Ihr kein zweites Gettysburg erleben wollt!
TEXT.Italian: Dammi ci? che chiedo o proverai l'ira della nostra "terribile e rapida spada."
TEXT.Spanish: Dadnos esto o sentir?is la c?lera de nuestra "terrible y veloz espada".

TEXT.English: Can you spare this for the people of the [OUR_EMPIRE]?
My people have faith in me, [CT_NAME]. Please help me not to disappoint them.
The simplest strategy is for me to ask you for what we need and hope your good will wins out.
TEXT.French: Pourriez-vous donner ceci ? un bon ami, [CT_NAME] ?
TEXT.German: Ihr werdet einem treuen Freund diese kleine Bitte doch nicht abschlagen, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Italian: Avresti un po' di questi in nome della nostra amicizia, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Podr?ais darles esto a unos buenos amigos, [CT_NAME]?

TEXT.English: Greetings, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME], leader of the great civilization of [OUR_CIV_SHORT].
TEXT.German: Seid gegrüßt, [CT_NAME]! Ich bin [OUR_NAME], Anführer der großen Zivilisation von [OUR_CIV_SHORT].

TEXT.English: Peace be upon you, [CT_NAME] of [CT_CIV_SHORT]. If you would expect the blessings of Allah, be kind to his people, for Allah will help him who moves the ways of Allah.
TEXT.German: Friede sei mit Euch, [CT_NAME] von [CT_CIV_SHORT]. Falls Ihr die Segnungen Allahs erwartet, seid freundlich zu seinem Volk, denn Allah wird dem helfen, der die Wege Allahs bewegt.

TEXT.English: I am [OUR_NAME], the President of the Turkish people. We Turks do not consider our principles as dogmas contained in books that are said to come from heaven. We derive our inspiration not from heaven, or from an unseen world, but directly from life.
TEXT.German: Seid gegrüßt, [CT_NAME]! Ich bin [OUR_NAME], Anführer der großen Zivilisation von [OUR_CIV_SHORT].

TEXT.English: Hola. I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. I am convinced that the good intentions of a ruler are simply not enough and that the collective factor represented by the workers is indispensable. Don't you agree [CT_NAME]?
Welcome [CT_NAME]. We would welcome friendship with you. Are you greedy of territory, or greedy of piece and quiet?
TEXT.German: Willkommen, [CT_NAME]. Wir würden Freundschaft mit Euch willkommen heißen. Giert Ihr nach Eroberungen, oder nach Frieden und Ruhe?

TEXT.English: Greetings, I am [OUR_NAME], the most clever woman that ever lived, and others cannot compare with me. I have four billion people dependent on my judgement.
TEXT.German: Grüße, ich bin [OUR_NAME], die klügste Frau, die jemals gelebt hat, und andere halten keinem Vergleich mit mir stand. Ich habe vier Milliarden Menschen, die von meinem Urteil abhängen.

TEXT.English: Greetings in the name of God, [CT_NAME] of [CT_CIV_SHORT]. We are Emperor [OUR_NAME] of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. We know that material and spiritual progress are essential to man. Will you join us as we ceaselessly work for the equal attainment of both?
TEXT.German: Grüße im Namen Gottes, [CT_NAME] von [CT_CIV_SHORT]. Wir sind Kaiser [OUR_NAME] von [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. Wir wissen, dass körperlicher und spiritueller Fortschritt essentiell für den Menschen sind. Werdet Ihr daran teilhaben, wie wir ununterbrochen für das gleichzeitige Erlangen von beidem arbeiten?

TEXT.English: Greetings, [CT_NAME]. My name is [OUR_NAME], and I am the president of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. My motto is: when there is respect, there is peace!
I, [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_CIV], greet you. Know that those who speak of nationalism, democracy, and such things want to take our nation away from its mission.
TEXT.German: Ich, [OUR_NAME] von [OUR_CIV_SHORT], grüße Euch. Wisset, dass jene, welche von Nationalismus, Demokratie und solchen Dingen sprechen, Eure Nation von ihrer Mission abbringen wollen.

TEXT.English: Greetings. I am [OUR_NAME], Emperor of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. Dedicating all my efforts to the well-being of my people, I shall guard the concept of Autocracy like all my forefathers did.
TEXT.German: Grüße. Ich bin [OUR_NAME], Kaiser von [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. Während ich all meine Anstrengungen dem Wohlergehen meines Volkes widme, werde ich das Konzept der Autokratie beschützen wie alle meine Vorväter.

TEXT.English: Welcome to humble [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. I am [OUR_NAME], leader of this far-reaching and ever progressing country. Tell me, who are you?
Hello, friend. My name is [OUR_NAME], but you can call me Jose. Or you can call me Francisco. Or you can call me Martin. Just don't call me late for dinner.
Hello, [CT_NAME]. I am General Santa Anna, Savior of Mexico! What have you come to offer me in tribute?
Greetings [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME], emperor of all the lands below the heavens. With absolute power over numberless minions, do you dare hurt the divine ruler of mighty [OUR_CIV_SHORT].

[OUR_NAME] of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] greets you. I do not praise myself or my courage, but I praise God, for he protected me, a sinful man, from deadly dangers and created me capable of doing many human things.
TEXT.German: [OUR_NAME] von [OUR_CIV_SHORT] grüßt Euch. Ich lobe weder mich selbst noch meinen Mut, aber ich lobe Gott, denn er beschützte mich, einen sündigen Mann, vor tödlichen Gefahren und ermöglichte mir, viele menschliche Dinge zu tun.

TEXT.English: We must get ready to build up the friendship between our peoples. How does a people get prepared for such an endeavour? By strengthening the natural bridges that exist between us. Language is a bridge... Religon is a bridge... History is a bridge...
TEXT.German: Wir müssen uns bereit machen, die Freundschaft zwischen unseren Völkern aufzubauen. Wie wird ein Volk auf solch ein Vorhaben vorbereitet? Indem wir die natürlichen Brücken stärken, die zwischen uns existieren. Sprache ist eine Brücke ... Religion ist eine Brücke ... Geschichte ist eine Brücke ...

TEXT.English: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. Imagination, devotion, perseverance, together with divine grace, will assure your success. What shall we discuss?
TEXT.German: Willkommen, [CT_NAME]. Vorstellungskraft, Hingabe, Durchhaltevermögen, zusammen mit Gottes Gnade, wird Euren Erfolg sichern. Was sollen wir besprechen?

TEXT.English: Greetings, [CT_NAME]! It is so great to be at peace with you glorious nation!
I see you have come to visit, [CT_NAME]. Tell me, what is it you wish to discuss.
Finally I get to talk to a worthy adversary. What can the [OUR_EMPIRE] do for you?
TEXT.French: Salutations, [CT_NAME] ! Asseyez-vous et bavardons un instant.
TEXT.German: Seid gegr??t, [CT_NAME]. Nehmt Platz und lasst uns ein wenig plaudern.
TEXT.Italian: Salve, [CT_NAME]. Siediti e parliamo per un po'.
TEXT.Spanish: Saludos, [CT_NAME]. Sentaos y charlemos un rato.

TEXT.English: Under heaven, people with righteousness are not murderers and arsonists like you.
TEXT.German: Unter dem Himmel sind Menschen von Rechtschaffenheit keine Mörder und Brandstifter wie Ihr.

TEXT.English: The world is well supplied with people who wish to rule and dominate others. People like you.
TEXT.German: Die Welt ist gut versorgt mit Menschen, die andere beherrschen und dominieren wollen. Menschen wie Euch.

TEXT.English: Oh, you again... What are you going to complain about?

If one permits an infidel to continue in his role as a corrupter of the earth, the infidel's moral suffering will be all the worse. If one kills the infidel, and this stops him from perpetrating his misdeeds, his death will be a blessing to him.
TEXT.German: Wenn man einem Ungläubigen erlaubt, seine Rolle als Verderber der Erde fortzusetzen, wird das moralische Leiden des Ungläubigen umso größer sein. Wenn man den Ungläubigen tötet, und ihn vom Fortsetzen seiner Untaten abhält, wird ihm sein Tod ein Segen sein.

TEXT.English: Treachery, cowardice and lies are everywhere - and your nation is no exception.
TEXT.German: Verrat, Feigheit und Lügen sind überall - und Eure Nation ist keine Ausnahme.

TEXT.English: Speak fast [CT_CIV_ADJ]. I have enough on my schedule already.
You lack the guile to trick me. Be warned I will not react well to deceit.
TEXT.French: Que me vaut l'honneur peu enviable de votre pr?sence ?
TEXT.German: Was verschafft mir die zweifelhafte Ehre Eures Besuchs?
TEXT.Italian: E a cosa devo il dubbio onore della tua presenza?
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Y a qu? debemos el dudoso honor de vuestra compa??a?

TEXT.English: The government of the [OUR_EMPIRE] will fulfill its duty to defend its independence, to repel foreign aggression, and accept the struggle to which it has been provoked!
No way! I shall punish you for your crimes against [OUR_CIV_SHORT] and its people!
I knew you would beg for peace eventually, but there will be no peace until you surrender.
TEXT.French: Comme un ami m'a dit un jour, "Aucune condition ne saurait ?tre accept?e, hormis une capitulation imm?diate et inconditionnelle." Dommage, n'est-ce pas ?
TEXT.German: Wie ein Freund von mir zu sagen pflegte: 'Ich akzeptiere nur die sofortige und bedingungslose Kapitulation'. ?u?erst treffend, nicht wahr?
TEXT.Italian: Come disse una volta un mio amico: "L'unica cosa accettabile ? una resa incondizionata e immediata." Conciso, non trovi?
TEXT.Spanish: Como un amigo m?o dijo una vez: "Ninguna condici?n es aceptable, salvo una rendici?n incondicional e inmediata". Es una l?stima, ¿no cre?is?

TEXT.English: Get out of my office!
You make me sad, [CT_NAME]. Go away.
I will now use my cunning knowledge of tactics to ignore you.
TEXT.German: Fahrt zur H?lle!

TEXT.English: A Mutual Protection Pact - Each Party Agrees to Automatically Declare War if the Other Party is Attacked.
TEXT.French: Pacte d'assistance mutuelle : chaque partie accepte de déclarer automatiquement la guerre si l'autre est attaquée.
TEXT.German: Ein Verteidigungsbündnis - Beide Parteien stimmen zu, den Angreifern der anderen Partei automatisch den Krieg zu erklären.
TEXT.Italian: Un patto di protezione reciproca: ogni civiltà accetta di dichiarare automaticamente guerra se la civiltà alleata viene attaccata.
TEXT.Spanish: Un acuerdo de protección mutua: cada parte accede a declarar automáticamente la guerra si alguien ataca a la otra.

TEXT.English: Slave Trade
TEXT.German: Sklavenhandel
